pageProduct.name: Tears Again Spray 10ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

TearsAgain® Liposomal Eye Spray works to stabilise the eye’s lipid layer to reduce excessive evaporation while hydrating and lubricating dry eyes. Contact lenses, strained eyes, environmental factors, air conditioning, ageing and screen time are common causes that can leave your eyes feeling dry and irritated. 

• Relieves dry & irritated eyes.
• Hydrates & lubricates dry eyes.
• Repairs the eye’s protective lipid layer.
• No need to remove contact lenses.
• Won’t smudge makeup!
• Vegan friendly
 

Warnings

Store below 25°C

Common Uses

To relieve dry eyes.

Ingredients

Ingredients: 
Soy lecithin, Sodium chloride, Ethanol,  Vitamin A palmitate, Vitamin E, Purified water 

Directions

Hold TearsAgain® 10cm away from eyes, spray 1 – 2 times on closed eyelids. Use as often as required. Suitable for daily use.
